hero.title: Your very own buddy for info about COVID-19.
hero.subtitle: Just a text message away!

about.title: Ask me about COVID-19
about.about_1: Hi, I’m your HealthBuddy. Send me a text in the chat window and I will give you information about the novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19), from the trusted sources of WHO and UNICEF.

about_3.emphasis_2: 2. Select from the list of common questions
about_3.emphasis_3: 3. Send me your questions in natural language:
about_3.text_1: from the language dropdown menu at the top of this web page.
about_3.text_3: as if you are talking to your friend.

features.title: About HealthBuddy
features.text: There is a lot of misinformation and myths about the new coronavirus (COVID-19 virus) circulating on the Internet and in social media. Misinformation is one of the biggest challenges in fighting COVID-19. This is why it’s important to be careful where you look for information and advice.
features.feature_1_text: HealthBuddy is available on multiple social media and instant messaging platforms in Europe to provide users with scientific and evidence-based advice.
features.feature_2_text: HealthBuddy detects the language of your browser and, if supported, will automatically speak in that language. You can also change the language from the languages menu.
features.feature_3_text: HealthBuddy is supported by experts from WHO and UNICEF and will provide you with accurate information on COVID-19.
features.feature_4_text: If you hear any rumours or fake statements in your community or region, you can report it to us here. HealthBuddy will compile them and counter them here with scientific information.
